cross_training_opportunities: Train a backend developer on CI/CD pipeline maintenance and basic Kubernetes monitoring.
contractor_augmentation_option: On-demand AWS/Kubernetes expert for architecture review.
cost_optimization: High cost due to single senior resource; cross-training is key for long-term cost reduction.
future_scaling: Cannot scale without hiring or significant cross-training. Current single point of failure.

cross_training_opportunities: Mid-level developer to pair on complex integrations; senior developer to learn basic DevOps.
contractor_augmentation_option: Not required; current team has sufficient capacity and expertise.
cost_optimization: Well-balanced team. Mid-level developer handles bulk of standard tasks, freeing senior for high-complexity work.
future_scaling: Can handle a ~30% increase in workload. A junior developer could be added and mentored effectively.

cross_training_opportunities: Document OWL component patterns for backend developers to handle minor UI changes.
contractor_augmentation_option: Odoo frontend specialist contractor available if primary resource is blocked.
cost_optimization: High cost for a single specialist. Cross-training is crucial for future cost management.
future_scaling: Single point of failure. Cannot scale without hiring an additional frontend developer.
